pageContext.claim: “As Americans, you need identification, sometimes in a very strong and accurate form, for almost everything you do.....except when it comes to the most important thing, VOTING for the people that run your country. Push hard for Voter Identification!”
pageContext.analysis: Thirty-four states have identification laws for voting, including seven with photo ID requirements. But there are few documented cases of in-person voter fraud, and minorities and the elderly make up a disproportionate percentage of the people without government-issued IDs.
